Oct 23, 2019

What is BEM?!

And why you should start using it!

BEM stands for Block-Element-Modifier and it’s basically a naming convention or set of rules you can use to name your HTML elements (with classes). Since it’s not a framework or a piece of software, you can simply start using it now.
